snippet.title: They Added New Levels! - Ninja Plays Pencil Peril
snippet.description:
They added new levels!
Ninja plays pencil peril

Play Here - https://gamejolt.com/games/PencilPeril/385157

Guys guess what?!?! They added more levels and they are even harder. They added jumping and also some more twists. Great job to the developers and ill continue to update as much as I can with the new content. Fun and entertaining game. Loved it. Such a troll at the end though, nice touch :)

More Videos to come, and let me know below what you guys think, like the video to help me out and subscribe for more content. Lets plays and stream highlights.


Thank you for watching Ninjas of the Dojo hope to see you later.


Hope you all enjoy!
New Videos will be posted every Day
For more great videos and content Visit https://www.twitch.tv/ninjafromabov3

To reach me you can contact me @ninjafromabov3 on most platforms (IG|Twitter|FB|Tumblr|Reddit)

Thanks for watching!

Also If you want some Ninja Merch go to https://streamlabs.com/ninjafromabov3... and pick some up!

To join the discord click the link here--  https://discord.gg/qMyvG9E and join in on our discussions about future videos.
